title:
A unital in the generalized hexagon of order two, and an exceptional
  isomorphism between finite groups of Lie type
abstract:
We construct a model of the Hermitian unital of order 3 (obtained from the
non-degenerate hermitian form in three variables over the field of order 9)
inside the octonion algebra over the field of order 2. This construction is
invariant under the automorphism group of that algebra, and explains the known
isomorphism from the finite group of exceptional Lie type onto the group of
semi-similitudes of the hermitian form.
